tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Accommodations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    impact_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE accommodation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    ratings FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_id INT,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT,
    water_usage FLOAT,
    electricity_usage FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (accommodation_id) REFERENCES accommodation(id)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accommodation_id INT,
  date DATE,
  energy_consumption FLOAT,
  waste_generated FLOAT,
  water_usage FLOAT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_accommodation FOREIGN KEY (accommodation_id) REFERENCES accommodations(accommodation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_monitoring (
  monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_id INT,
  score FLOAT,
  comments TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_impact FOREIGN KEY (impact_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact(impact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_id INT,
    date DATE,
    electricity_consumption FLOAT,
    water_consumption FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    room_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE guests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    accommodation_id INT REFERENCES accommodations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_id INT REFERENCES guests(id),
    check_in DATE,
    check_out DATE,
    payment DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE services (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    accommodation_id INT REFERENCES accommodations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accommodation_id INT REFERENCES accommodations(id),
    guest_id INT REFERENCES guests(id),
    cleanliness_rating INT,
    service_rating INT,
    overall_rating INT
);
